about_the_game:
Description

Become an entrepreneur with Factory Simulator: Clothing & Outlet. In this immersive first-person simulator, you start by opening your own factory and shop, where you produce a wide array of items, from clothes and bags to mugs and phone cases.

Key Features:

  • Design and Production: Design your own unique products or purchase existing licenses for production.
  • Factory Management: Manage and expand your factory, upgrade the number of machinery, manage resources and increase production capacity to meet growing demands.
  • Retail Experience: Set up and personalize your shop, selecting from a variety of items and furniture to create a welcoming and attractive retail space.
  • Sales and Marketing: Choose strategies to attract customers, manage inventory, and set prices to maximize profits.
  • Hiring Workers: Recruit and manage employees to help with production, sales, and other tasks, increasing efficiency and productivity.
  • Wholesale Orders: Take on large-scale wholesale orders and ship your products worldwide, expanding your brand's reach.
  • Expansion and Growth: Continuously expand both your factory and shop, unlocking new features and opportunities as your business flourishes.

Factory Simulator: Clothing & Outlet provides a detailed and captivating experience, allowing you to develop and expand your factory and outlet business from scratch.
